code: import firebase from'firebase';var firebaseApp=firebase.initializeApp({apiKey:"AIzaSyA38kfX86xKIFYKHtEF4kcGHqRwykRoAwY",authDomain:"bee-site.firebaseapp.com",databaseURL:"https://bee-site.firebaseio.com",projectId:"bee-site",storageBucket:"bee-site.appspot.com",messagingSenderId:"229508092357",appId:"1:229508092357:web:1d1ac5c1acb8c21f3b3bac",measurementId:"G-E9RFFFQJ9H"});var messagesRef=firebase.database().ref('messages');var saveMessage=function saveMessage(firstName,lastName,email,address,city,zipCode,phone){var newMessageRef=messagesRef.push();newMessageRef.set({firstName:firstName,lastName:lastName,email:email,address:address,city:city,zipCode:zipCode,phone:phone});};export default saveMessage;
